description: Play the free version of Gangstar now!   Head for the West Coast and plunge into the world of L.A. gangs with Gangstar. Explore hyper-realistic environments and complete missions combining the best of action games and platformers. Gameplay is completely intuitive thanks to touch controls, and the automatic aiming system makes shootouts even more thrilling. As you drive by in your 4X4, choose your favorite radio station: hip-hop, reggae, punk rock...  FULL GAME FEATURES: - Unique freedom of movement: drive on the road for miles in open environments. Complete 50 missions at your own pace, or do what you've always wanted to! - A huge map with lots of neighborhoods directly inspired by Los Angeles: Beverly Hills, Chinatown, the port, the suburbs, and more... - The first Palm Pre game to offer such rich graphics: a city entirely rendered in 3D, detailed buildings, beautiful settings, amazing cars and jaw-dropping collisions. - A breathtaking plot: explore the city, use your weapon or brawl melee-style, steal cars, eliminate your enemies and go wherever you want on car or on foot. Make a name for yourself by creating ties to other gangs, but watch out for the cops!  Follow the official Twitter account to get more info about the game: http://twitter.com/Gangstar_game
